H0.text: Which brewery is based in Southwold, Suffolk. Greene King

H1.text: Which brewery is based in Southwold, Suffolk. BrewDog

H2.text: Which brewery is based in Southwold, Suffolk. Fuller's

H3.text: Which brewery is based in Southwold, Suffolk. Adnams

A4.text: Adnams is a regional brewery founded in 1872 in Southwold, Suffolk, England, by George and Ernest Adnams.

A5.text: The Sole Bay Brewery in Southwold was purchased in 1872 by George and Ernest Adnams.
